make up to somebody.translation[0].defin: to do something to show that you are sorry about the problems you have caused someone
I’ll make it up to you somehow.
He was looking for a way to make up to her for what he had done.
to say nice things to someone or be very friendly to them in order to get an advantage for yourself – used to show disapproval
to be given a higher position in an organization
He was a security guard before he was made up to reception manager.
